name: Mama's Kumquat
ingredients: 15ml honey syrup (made by mixing equal parts honey and hot water)
directions: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the rosemary sprig to release its oils.
Add the vodka, kumquat juice, honey syrup, and lemon juice to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a slice of kumquat and a sprig of rosemary.

name: Santa's Salty Sack
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, simple syrup, and a pinch of sea salt to the shaker.
Shake the ingredients vigorously for about 10-15 seconds, until well combined and chilled.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish the cocktail with a sprig of rosemary.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Curse These Metal Hands
ingredients: 15 ml honey syrup (made by mixing equal parts honey and hot water)
directions: In a cocktail shaker, add all ingredients except the egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake well for about 15 seconds.
Remove the ice and add the egg white to the shaker.
Shake again without ice for about 10 seconds to emulsify the egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake again for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled glass and garnish with a sprinkle of smoked paprika.

name: The Farmer's Wife
ingredients: 15 ml honey syrup (1:1 honey and water)
Carrot ribbons and thyme sprigs for garnish
directions: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the fresh thyme sprig.
Add the vodka, lemon juice, honey syrup, and carrot juice to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled glass filled with ice.
Garnish with carrot ribbons and a sprig of thyme.
Enjoy your refreshing and delicious "The Farmer's Wife" cocktail!

name: Gingers Do Have Souls
ingredients: 15 ml honey syrup (1:1 honey and water)
directions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add the ginger beer, vodka, lime juice, honey syrup, and bitters to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a piece of candied ginger.
Enjoy your "Gingers Do Have Souls" cocktail!

name: Danny Dyer's Chocolate Homunculus
ingredients: 1 small scoop of vanilla ice cream
directions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add the chocolate liqueur, hazelnut liqueur, vodka, raspberry syrup, and Angostura bitters to the shaker.
Shake well until the ingredients are mixed together.
Strain the mixture into a glass.
Add a small scoop of vanilla ice cream to the glass.
Garnish with chocolate shavings.

name: Jamie Oliver
ingredients: 1 Turkey Twizzler, chopped into small pieces
directions: In a shaker, muddle the chopped Turkey Twizzler with the rosemary sprig.
Add the vodka, cranberry juice, lemon juice, simple syrup, Worcestershire sauce, and liquid smoke to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Strain the cocktail into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a small piece of Turkey Twizzler and a sprig of rosemary.

name: Donner Kebab
ingredients: 1 small piece of grilled lamb (optional, for garnish)
1 small piece of pita bread (optional, for garnish)
directions: In a shaker, combine the vodka, pomegranate juice, lemon juice, honey syrup, hot sauce, garlic powder, cumin powder, and paprika.
Add ice to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the cocktail into a glass filled with ice.
For the garnish, skewer a small piece of grilled lamb and a small piece of pita bread on a toothpick and place it on top of the cocktail.
Serve and enjoy your unique Donner Kebab cocktail!

name: Nacho Cheese
directions: In a cocktail shaker, add tequila, lime juice, pineapple juice, triple sec, agave syrup, and jalapeño pepper slices.
Muddle the jalapeño slices in the cocktail shaker to release its flavor.
Add a small piece of cheddar cheese to the shaker and shake vigorously.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
Crush some tortilla chips and sprinkle them over the top of the cocktail.
Garnish with a slice of jalapeño pepper and serve immediately.

name: Queen Elizabeth II
directions: In a shaker, combine the gin, Earl Grey tea, lemon juice, honey syrup, orange bitters, and egg white.
Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
Add ice to the shaker and shake again for another 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a small piece of edible gold leaf on top of the foam.

name: The Kanye
directions: In a shaker, combine the vodka, crab juice, lemon juice, simple syrup, wasabi paste, egg white, and bitters.
Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 10 seconds to emulsify the egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake again for about 15 seconds to chill and dilute the cocktail.
Strain the mixture into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a skewered crab stick.

name: The Donald
ingredients: 15 ml Wotsits cheese powder (available in most supermarkets)
A handful of crushed Wotsits (for garnish)
directions: In a shaker, combine the vodka, orange juice, Wotsits cheese powder, lemon juice, and simple syrup.
Add ice and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a handful of crushed Wotsits on top.

name: Vindaloo
ingredients: Mango slice and chili pepper for garnish
directions: In a shaker, combine the vodka, mango juice, lime juice, and ginger syrup.
Add the cayenne pepper, garam masala, turmeric, cumin, coriander, and cinnamon to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds.
Strain the cocktail into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a slice of mango and a chili pepper.

name: Ronald McDonald
ingredients: 1 small piece of cooked ground beef
directions: In a shaker, muddle the small piece of cooked ground beef until it is broken up into small pieces.
Add the vodka, tomato juice, pickle juice, and mustard syrup to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a slice of American cheese, a small piece of lettuce, a small piece of tomato, and a small piece of onion.
Toast the sesame seed bun and place it on the rim of the glass.

name: The Snoop
directions: In a cocktail shaker, combine gin, orange juice, grapefruit juice, and honey syrup.
Add a handful of ice cubes to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the cocktail into a glass filled with ice cubes.
Using a dropper, add 5 ml of liquid smoke to the cocktail and stir gently.
Garnish the cocktail with a sprig of fresh rosemary.

name: Kylie Jenner's Big Lips
directions: In a cocktail shaker, combine the bubblegum-flavored vodka, blue curaçao, raspberry syrup, lemon juice, and egg white.
Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 10 seconds to emulsify the egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake again for about 10 seconds to chill and dilute the cocktail.
Strain the cocktail into a chilled glass.
Garnish with candy lips on the rim of the glass.
Serve and enjoy the sweet and sour taste of Kylie Jenner's Big Lips cocktail!

name: Software Made Me Sad
directions: In a cocktail shaker, combine the dark rum, blackberry liqueur, coffee liqueur, activated charcoal syrup, lemon juice, orange bitters, and egg white.
Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to emulsify the egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake again for another 10-15 seconds to chill and dilute the drink.
Strain the mixture into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or blackberry, if desired.

name: Canada Goose
directions: In a cocktail shaker, combine the Canadian whisky, fresh lemon juice, maple syrup, egg white, and Angostura bitters.
Add a handful of ice cubes to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled glass.
Garnish with maple flakes on top.

name: Turkish Delight
directions: In a cocktail shaker, add the Raki, pomegranate juice, rose water, honey, and egg white.
Add a few ice cubes to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds.
Pour the mixture through a strainer into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a sprinkle of dried rose petals.
Serve and enjoy your Turkish Delight cocktail!

name: Kit Kat Martini
ingredients: 1 Kit Kat chocolate bar (broken into small pieces)
directions: In a cocktail shaker, add the vodka, crème de cacao, hazelnut liqueur, and Kit Kat pieces.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Top with whipped cream (optional) and garnish with a small piece of Kit Kat chocolate.

name: Mushroom Soup
ingredients: 15 ml honey syrup (equal parts honey and water)
directions: To make the mushroom-infused gin, add a handful of dried shiitake mushrooms to a bottle of gin and let it infuse for at least 24 hours.
In a shaker, combine the mushroom-infused gin, dry vermouth, lemon juice, honey syrup, absinthe, and egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake vigorously for at least 30 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a sprig of fresh thyme.

name: Viva La France
directions: In a shaker, add the cognac, crème de cassis, lemon juice, and lavender syrup.
Add ice cubes to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a champagne flute.
Top up the glass with sparkling wine.
Garnish with a sprig of fresh thyme.

name: A Bloody Mess
directions: In a shaker filled with ice, combine tomato juice, vodka, hot sauce, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, lemon juice, horseradish, salt, and pepper.
Shake well for about 10 seconds.
Rim a glass with a mixture of beetroot powder and smoked paprika.
Strain the cocktail into the glass.
Garnish with a celery stick or a slice of bacon.
